result_scan.check_skin_type: Check to see what skin type you are!
result_scan.recommendation: This product is safe for pregnant and breastfeeding.

test_skin_type.check_with_paper: Check your skin type with oil blotting papers
test_skin_type.remove_makeup: Remove makeup, clean your face thoroughly before going to sleep. Note, do not apply any skincare products.
test_skin_type.temperature: Make sure the fan is turned on. If you turn on the air conditioner, keep the temperature around 25-28.
test_skin_type.clean_face: Clean your face thoroughly and be careful not to apply any skincare products. Go to bed and sleep well.
test_skin_type.using_paper: When you wake up, start taking four pieces of oil blotting paper and apply them to your face in the following areas: forehead, nose, and cheeks.
test_skin_type.question: How are your 4 pieces of oil blotting paper?
